name: You're Just Like Pop Music
lyrics:
[Intro]
You're just like pop music

[Verse 1]
The last thing I remember was our call back in January
But nothing comes up afterwards, been a while I've seen you onscreen

[Pre-Chorus]
'Cause I have been on DND
Our message count is less than three
When I said that you're free to talk to me
I got used to having you around
But in the end, it's neither of our faults 'cause

[Chorus]
Back then, I listened to your voice 24/7
We were dancing through it all, dancing through it
Although I do miss the times we've spent together
You're so 2020
You're just like pop music

[Verse 2]
Your icon on the VC, it highlighted my virtual space
Now I only see you on my feed, means we both really went our ways

[Pre-Chorus]
'Cause I have been on DND
Our message count is less than three
When I said that you're free to talk to me
I got used to having you around
But in the end, it's neither of our faults 'cause

[Chorus]
Back then, I listened to your voice 24/7
We were dancing through it all, dancing through it
Although I do miss the times we've spent together
You're so 2020
You're just like pop music

[Bridge]
Just like songs in the radio
Every memory will come and go
Sometimes I wonder if I'm to blame
That those wistful days are now long gone

[Chorus]
Back then, you listened to my voice 24/7
(We were dancing through it all, dancing through it)
Although I do miss the times we've spent together
I'm so 2020
Back then, I listened to your voice 24/7
We were dancing through it all, dancing through it
Although I do miss the times we've spent together
You're so 2020
You're just like pop music

[Outro]
Just like, just like pop music
Just like, just like pop music
Just like, just like pop music
You're just like pop music
Just like, just like pop music
Just like, just like pop music
Just like, just like pop music
You're just like pop music
You're just like pop music
